item.title: Sarah add a quote by Eleanor Henderson
item.description: "Jude's desire for girls was indiscriminate feverish and complete he wanted them all equally and he wanted them not at all. Blondes and brunettes big ones or small ones - they were cold fragile impenetrable creatures all desirable as they were undesirable all perfumed and pretty." -- Eleanor Henderson

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Eleanor Henderson
item.description: "He, Teddy and Eliza entered the room just as someone was snapping a picture: they would be forever captured in a photo they didn't belong in, blinking against the flash." -- Eleanor Henderson
